restedreductiongear套接式减速齿轮restharrow匍匐茎柄花-
restful 蓝天, restharrow 匍匐芒柄花, restful 贝尔尼

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from obsolete rest 'stop, arrest' + harrow (because the tough stems impeded the progress of a harrow)

means.word_mean: 1. Eurasian plant having loose racemes of pink or purple flowers and spiny stems and tough roots
2. European woody plant having pink flowers and unifoliate leaves and long tough roots; spreads by underground runners
